channel.title: Whonix IP Check - 503 Service Unavailable
channel.description:
Why do i get directed to a page that displays "503 service unavailable " after clicking on IPCheck ? i reinstalled both gateway and workstation , yet i am receiving the same error. the page displays "Apache Server at checkdottorprojectdotorg Port 443" too
any suggestions ?

item.title: Whonix IP Check - 503 Service Unavailable
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
https://check.torproject.org is not hosted by Whonix. As indicated by the domain name, it is hosted by The Tor Project. Therefore Whonix project cannot answer this inquiry.

Seems like meanwhile there is a better error message.

https://check.torproject.org

Service Unavailable

The server is temporarily unable to service your request due to maintenance downtime or capacity problems. Please try again later.

https://web.archive.org/web/20210219103111/https://check.torproject.org/

related:

Whonix – 26 Dec 20

Browser Tests - Whonix

check.torproject.org says "Sorry. You are not using Tor."? On false positives. And browser fingerprinting. How unique are you? On Browser Tests and Browser Security. Notes on sites such as ip-check.info and whoer.net.

Read full topic
